Customer_Review: Aldo and his wife as well as crew recently painted our home and they did a wonderful job! My wife found Aldo after we had been searching a couple of other painters and we were very pleased in hiring him.Aldo was very honest and helpful and also helped to suggest a color that would fit what we were looking for. Him and his crew were very professional and completed the job in two days which was very fast considering the size of the home.He offers great value in pricing and his crew did a great job masking and clearing up. Don't hesitate to check him out, you won't be disappointed.

Aldo and his team worked with and for me on dozens of contracted projects between 2017 and 2019. His crew handles great work, from simple wall repaints to intricate interior fine finish millwork to complete Residential exterior restorations. Aldo and his leads are seasoned and knowledgeable painters with extensive experience, and they know how to prepare properly and paint to procure excellent results. I highly recommend them.

We needed to have our exterior completed after I had painted as much as I could possibly reach (I don't belong up a ladder).  After contacting and being rejected by many painting companies, we contacted Aldo at Gongora.  He agreed to do the job for a really reasonable price.  Best of all, he squeezed us in that very week, and we no longer have to wonder when we are finally going to get the house finished.  Great communication and kind, professional crew.

Aldo painted our whole condo over a few days last year. He & his wife were a pleasure to work with. Always on time & on budget. He was very flexible with us changing our mind with colors and even offered his advice. His quality of work is amazing, everything was taped and lines were clean. He did an inspection with me to go over any issues and they cleaned up the place great. I've recommend him to my friends as well. I'll be hiring him in the future for any painting needs.

Aldo and his team did an exceptional job on our kitchen cabinetry. They were gracious and professional -- on time and on budget -- and their work is truly perfection. I can't recommend them highly enough. We have worked with a number of local painting companies over the years and Gongora is the best!
